title: Manage OpenTelemetry Collectors at scale with Ansible
author: OpenTelemetry Authors; Docs CC BY
description: You can scale the deployment of OpenTelemetry Collector across multiple Linux hosts through Ansible, to function both as gateways and agents within your observability architecture. Using the OpenTelemetry Collector in this dual capacity enables a robust collection and forwarding of metrics, traces, and logs to analysis and visualization platforms. We outline a strategy for deploying and managing the OpenTelemetry Collector’s scalable instances throughout your infrastructure using Ansible. In the following example, we’ll use Grafana as the target backend for metrics.
cntitle: 使用 Ansible 大规模管理 OpenTelemetry 收集器
cndescription: 您可以通过 Ansible 在多个 Linux 主机上扩展 OpenTelemetry Collector 的部署，使其在您的可观测性架构中同时充当网关和代理。以这种双重身份使用 OpenTelemetry Collector 能够将指标、跟踪和日志可靠地收集并转发到分析和可视化平台。我们概述了一种使用 Ansible 在整个基础架构中部署和管理 OpenTelemetry Collector 可扩展实例的策略。在以下示例中，我们将使用 Grafana 作为指标的目标后端。
